definition: to obtain/to get/to gain/to catch (a disease)/proper/suitable/proud/contented/to allow/to permit/ready/finished
structural particle: used after a verb (or adjective as main verb), linking it to following phrase indicating effect, degree, possibility etc
to have to/must/ought to/to need to

sentences.english: To me, in the love of the river, I often feel like I was upstream .
sentences.chinese: 于我，在爱情的河流里，我经常觉得自己在逆流而上。

sentences.english: I think he thought, If Michael can do it, I can do it.
sentences.chinese: 我想他是觉得如果迈克尔能做到，他也能做到。

sentences.english: Do you think it's possible for me to change to a single room with a bath?
sentences.chinese: 你觉得我有可能换到一间有卫浴设备的单人房吗？

sentences.english: She was embarrassed when they kept telling her she had a genius for mathematics.
sentences.chinese: 他们总是对她说她有数学蠢才，她觉得很不好心思。

sentences.english: The whole shebang smells sort of fishy to me.
sentences.chinese: 整个事情使我觉得有点蹊跷。

sentences.english: It was fine at first; most of my friends had moved home too.
sentences.chinese: 起初我觉得还好，我的很多朋友也都回家投靠父母了。

sentences.english: I am shy and find social situations stressful.
sentences.chinese: 我很怕羞，觉得社会场合有压力。

sentences.english: What do you think about Union Square?
sentences.chinese: 你觉得联合广场怎么样？

sentences.english: This will help on days that you don’t feel like cooking.
sentences.chinese: 这样每天下来你就不会觉得自己在煮饭了。

sentences.english: In a funny way, it was the last day at Highbury.
sentences.chinese: 在海布里的最后一天，这多少让人觉得有点不舒服。

sentences.english: I have chills and a headache.
I felt it useless for us to say anything further.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得我们再说下去也没有用。

sentences.english: Do you think it's worth paying so much for designer products?
sentences.chinese: 你觉得为设计师的产品花那么多钱值得吗？

sentences.english: High I feel that I do most of the one thing that is out of the literary agency.
sentences.chinese: 高二我觉得我做的最对的一件事就是退出了文学社。

sentences.english: She always thinks that she was born unlucky, and could not encounter main chances.
sentences.chinese: 她总觉得自己命薄，赶不上好机会。

sentences.english: I think we should go into the cave.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得我们还是回到那个山洞。

definition: to feel/to become aware of/feeling/sense/perception/CL:個|个[ge4]
to speak the truth/truth to tell/frankly
is or isn't/yes or no/whether or not
to feel/to sense/to have the feeling that/to think that/to move/to affect
straight/erect/to stick out (a part of the body)/to (physically) straighten up/to support/to withstand/outstanding/(coll.) quite/very/classifier for machine guns
(modal particle indicating suggestion or surmise)/...right?/...OK?/...I presume.
bar (loanword) (serving drinks, or providing Internet access etc)/to puff (on a pipe etc)/(onom.) bang/abbr. for 貼吧|贴吧[tie1 ba1]
like that/in that way/or so/so/so very much/about/in that case
